member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_DecoderCaps_BwdMaxRateAudio
member.summary: Gets maximum audio data rate in reverse direction. (0 if decoder does not support the smooth reverse mechanism.)

member.summary: Gets maximum subpicture data rate in reverse direction. (0 if decoder does not support the smooth reverse mechanism.)

member.summary: Gets maximum video data rate in reverse direction. (0 if decoder does not support the smooth reverse mechanism.)

member.summary: Gets maximum audio data rate in forward direction.

member.summary: Gets maximum subpicture data rate in forward direction.

member.summary: Gets maximum video data rate in forward direction.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Disc_CurrentUOPS
member.summary: Gets a set of flags indicating which navigation commands, if any, the content authors have explicitly disabled for the current disc location.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_DefaultLanguageS
member.summary: Gets DVD menu default language as String.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_AudioAttributes_HasMultichannelInfo
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether her multichannel attributes are present.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_AudioAttributes_Quantization
member.summary: Gets audio BPS. Zero indicates the BPS is unknown.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_AudioPresent
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether audio stream is present.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_CompatibleRegion
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether region is compatible. A value of false indicates that the region is compatible (permitted). A value of true indicates that the region is not compatible.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_SubpicturePresent
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether subpicture stream present.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_VideoAttributes_AspectX
member.summary: Gets video stream's X aspect (4 or 16).

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_VideoAttributes_AspectY
member.summary: Gets video stream's Y aspect (3 or 9).

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_VideoAttributes_FrameHeight
member.summary: Gets frame height in lines (525 for a frame rate of 60 Hz or 625 for 50 Hz).

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_VideoAttributes_FrameRate
member.summary: Gets frame rate in hertz (Hz), either 25 or 30.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_VideoAttributes_IsFilmMode
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether DVD is in Firm mode. For 625/50 Hz systems, true means "film mode" and false means "camera mode."

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_VideoAttributes_IsSourceLetterboxed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether source is letterboxed. true means the source video is in letterbox format. Subpictures and menu buttons can only be displayed in the active video area.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_VideoAttributes_LetterboxPermitted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether source is letterboxed. true means the picture can be shown as letterbox if the display aspect ratio is 4:3.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_VideoAttributes_Line21Field1InGOP
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether user data present in line 21, field 1. true means there is user data in line 21, field 1.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_VideoAttributes_Line21Field2InGOP
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether user data present in line 21, field 2. true means there is user data in line 21, field 2.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_Menu_VMG_Attributes_VideoAttributes_PanscanPermitted
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether panscan permitted. true means the picture can be shown as pan-scan if the display aspect ratio is 4:3.

member.name: P:VisioForge.MediaInfo.MediaInfoNV.DVD_ParentalLevel
member.summary: Gets the parental levels that are defined for a particular title. Result is DVD_PARENTAL_LEVEL enumeration.
